modName: My 100 Percent Complete Skyrim Save Version
summary:
Thane of each of Skyrim\'s nine Holds
All Main and side Quests of the Vanilla Game Complete  
All Dragonborn Main and Side Quests Complete
All Dawnguard Hunters Main and Side Quests Complete 
All Hearthfire Houses Fully Complete and Decorated  
All Favors/Small Tasks Around Holds Cities And Settlements Complete
All Guilds Complete
descriptionHtml:
Added PS3 EU&US Versions Saves Format and Xbox 360 Save Format...

Info on Save Version 1.00:
All Main and side Quests of the Vanilla Game Complete  
All Dragonborn Main and Side Quests Complete
All Dawnguard Hunters Main and Side Quests Complete 
All Hearthfire Houses Fully Complete and Decorated  
All Favors/Small Tasks Around Holds Cities And Settlements Complete
All Guilds Complete And restored to full Glory 
Married to Yosalda, have 2 kids Girl and boy (not From the orphanage in Riften) 
Character Name: Taran      and Race; Nord
Level 100     Gold 3646687988
Acquired the following Titles:
    Thane of each of Skyrim\'s nine Holds
    King of the Rieklings in Mead Hall
    Nightingale of Nocturnal
    Guildmaster of the Thieves Guild
    Harbinger of The Companions
    Listener of The Dark Brotherhood
    Arch-Mage of The College of Winterhold
    Bard of Bards College
    Bloodkin of the Orcs
    Champion of Azura
    Champion of Clavicus Vile
    Champion of Boethiah
    Champion of Hircine
    Champion of Hermaeus Mora
    Champion of Malacath
    Champion of Mehrunes Dagon
    Champion of Mephala
    Champion of Meridia
    Champion of Molag Bal
    Champion of Namira
    Champion of Peryite
    Champion of Sanguine
    Champion of Sheogorath
    War Hero of the Stormcloaks
    Ysmir, Dragon of the North
    Agent of Dibella
    Agent of Mara
    Vampire Hunter of the Dawnguard 
Health, Magica, Stamina and Carrying weight MAXED
All Perks Unlocked and 100+ left
All Skills are 100
All Powers, Shouts, Spells Unlocked (Testing once 2)
All Epic Weapons, Outfits, Armors, Mics Items are in inventory 
Essentials Tags Removed from all Vanilla game only essentials NPC\'s
All the special Weapons that are rewarded by Jarls for becoming a Thane of hold or some other reason, are on weapon racks in one of the 3 hearthfire homes (lakeview manor probably)... 
The Quest Journals and Notes are in windhelm house.

And Some other Stuff i cant remember right now...

Info on Save Version 1.50:
Unlocked All Werewolf and Vampire lord Perks...
All locations Discovered/unlocked 
Player size is changed...
Added special enchanted weapons with Unrelenting Force and other cool enchants... 
Added epic clothes and armor with good new enchants...
Spawned testing hall 4 containers with all mics items, all normal weapons, all normal armors, all clothing... they are all placed in one same spot so it will look like there is only 1 chest but you can open them all, and Spawned Ghost Horse Shadowmere, Karinda, Barbas Dog and some other epic NPC\'s near solstheim player house... 
Added the Vivid Rings and some other cool items with great new enchantments:
Fixed the Carrying weight and maxed it to 1000000
Maxed health, stamina, magica to 20000000
Added 999 dragon souls
Added the player to the Bandit, forsworn, falmer, animals, duagers and to some other factions. Now almost all Enemies are friendly...
Modded the Unarmed damage to one hit kill
Modded the bows speed 
Modded the Speed of movement and the swords swing speed
unlocked all the map locations
no shout cold down time (unlimited shouts) 
time set to real life
unlocked all shouts,spells,powers
Modded conjuration time 
Modded Killcam for a better chance to have killcam and modded the decapitation chance. (this only works when one enemies is there).
author: T36
